trans-unit.source: Captures and presents execution details about a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 捕获并显示有关 Web 请求的执行详细信息。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: You can use this class to append messages to specific trace categories.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于将消息附加到特定跟踪类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are creating an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> class for your application, you might include the trace message "Starting To Render" in a rendering procedure, and "Raising OnChange Event" in an event handler procedure.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果要创建的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>类为应用程序，你可能会包括跟踪消息"启动呈现"在呈现过程中和"引发更改事件"中的事件处理程序过程中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the TraceContext class to obtain a set of trace records at the end of request execution for custom processing.
trans-unit.target: TraceContext 类还可用于获取一组自定义处理的请求执行末尾的跟踪记录。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 跟踪概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To enable tracing, set the `Trace` attribute in the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive or the <xref:System.Web.TraceContext.IsEnabled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用跟踪，设置`Trace`属性中[@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指令或<xref:System.Web.TraceContext.IsEnabled%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.TraceContext.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When tracing is enabled, in addition to showing user-provided trace content, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class automatically includes performance data, control-tree structure information, and state management content for every request.
trans-unit.target: 启用跟踪后，显示用户提供的跟踪内容，除了<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>类会自动包括性能数据、 控制树的结构信息和状态管理内容，为每个请求。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> that contains information about the current Web request.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>包含有关当前 Web 请求的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether tracing is enabled for the current Web request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为当前 Web 请求启用跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Use this flag to check whether your page or application should output tracing information before it writes anything to the trace log.
trans-unit.target: 使用此标志来检查是否页面或应用程序应输出跟踪信息之前它将任何内容写入跟踪日志。

trans-unit.source: The value of the IsEnabled property depends on the settings in the subsection of the `system.web` configuration section and the value of the `trace` attribute of the directive.
trans-unit.target: IsEnabled 属性的值取决于的小节中的设置`system.web`配置节和的值`trace`指令的特性。

trans-unit.source: The tracing option set in the page directive takes precedence over the option set in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 在页面指令中设置跟踪选项优先于配置文件中设置的选项。

trans-unit.source: Setting the IsEnabled value programmatically takes precedence over both the page directive attribute and the configuration setting.
trans-unit.target: 以编程方式设置 IsEnabled 值将优先于页指令特性以及的配置设置。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the IsEnabled property to `true` for an entire application, you must explicitly set this property to `false` for any page in the application for which you do not want tracing information displayed.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果将 IsEnabled 属性设置为`true`整个应用程序，你必须显式将此属性设置`false`你不想显示的跟踪信息的应用程序中的任何页。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if tracing is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用了跟踪;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raised by the <xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref> object to expose trace messages after all request information is gathered.
trans-unit.target: 引发由<xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref>对象来公开跟踪消息后会收集所有请求信息。

trans-unit.source: The TraceFinished event is raised during the `EndRequest` stage of HTTP request processing.
trans-unit.target: TraceFinished 事件期间引发`EndRequest`的 HTTP 请求处理阶段。

trans-unit.source: It is raised by a <xref:System.Web.TraceContext> object after all request information is gathered, to expose the collection of <xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord> messages to registered <xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventHandler> delegates.
trans-unit.target: 由引发<xref:System.Web.TraceContext>对象后所有请求收集信息，以公开的集合<xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord>消息注册<xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventHandler>委托。</xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord> </xref:System.Web.TraceContext>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the sorted order in which trace messages should be output to a requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在其中跟踪消息应将输出到请求的浏览器的排序的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Trace messages can be sorted in the order they were processed, or alphabetically by user-defined category.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪消息可以进行排序，按顺序处理它们，或按字母顺序由用户定义的类别。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.TraceMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.TraceMode"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default is the setting specified by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_traceMode" name="traceMode" href=""></xref> attribute in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_trace" name="trace" href=""></xref> section of a configuration file, whose default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_SortByTime" name="SortByTime" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为指定的设置<xref uid="langword_csharp_traceMode" name="traceMode" href=""></xref>属性中<xref uid="langword_csharp_trace" name="trace" href=""></xref>配置文件，其默认值是节<xref uid="langword_csharp_SortByTime" name="SortByTime" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.TraceMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 所选的值不是之一<xref href="System.Web.TraceMode"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Writes a trace message to the trace log.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪日志中写入跟踪消息。

trans-unit.source: All warnings appear in the log as red text.
trans-unit.target: 所有警告在日志中都显示为红色文本。

trans-unit.source: Every time the <xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Warn%2A> method is called, a <xref:System.Web.TraceContext> trace message is added to the <xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A> messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the <xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished> event.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Warn%2A>调用方法时，<xref:System.Web.TraceContext>跟踪消息添加到<xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A>消息回收，这在处理时是可访问<xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished>事件。</xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished> </xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A> </xref:System.Web.TraceContext> </xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Warn%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is added with its <xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A> property set to `true` and its <xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A> property set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 添加消息，使用其<xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A>属性设置为`true`及其<xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A>属性设置为`null`。</xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A> </xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A>

trans-unit.source: The trace message to write to the log.
trans-unit.target: 要写入日志的跟踪消息。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information to the trace log, including any user-defined categories and trace messages.
trans-unit.target: 写入跟踪信息写入跟踪日志，包括任何用户定义的类别，跟踪消息。

trans-unit.source: All warnings appear in the log as red text.
trans-unit.target: 所有警告在日志中都显示为红色文本。

trans-unit.source: Every time the <xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Warn%2A> method is called, a <xref:System.Web.TraceContext> trace message is added to the <xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A> messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the <xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished> event.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Warn%2A>调用方法时，<xref:System.Web.TraceContext>跟踪消息添加到<xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A>消息回收，这在处理时是可访问<xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished>事件。</xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished> </xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A> </xref:System.Web.TraceContext> </xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Warn%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is added with its <xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A> property set to `true` and its <xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A> property set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 添加消息，使用其<xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A>属性设置为`true`及其<xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A>属性设置为`null`。</xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A> </xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A>

trans-unit.source: The trace category that receives the message.
trans-unit.target: 接收的消息跟踪类别。

trans-unit.source: The trace message to write to the log.
trans-unit.target: 要写入日志的跟踪消息。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information to the trace log, including any user-defined categories, trace messages, and error information.
trans-unit.target: 将跟踪信息写入跟踪日志，包括任何用户定义的类别、 跟踪消息和错误的信息。

trans-unit.source: All warnings appear in the log as red text.
trans-unit.target: 所有警告在日志中都显示为红色文本。

trans-unit.source: Every time the <xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Warn%2A> method is called, a <xref:System.Web.TraceContext> trace message is added to the <xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A> messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the <xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished> event.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Warn%2A>调用方法时，<xref:System.Web.TraceContext>跟踪消息添加到<xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A>消息回收，这在处理时是可访问<xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished>事件。</xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished> </xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A> </xref:System.Web.TraceContext> </xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Warn%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is added with its <xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A> property set to `true`, and the <xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A> property is set to the object passed by the `errorInfo` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 添加消息，使用其<xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A>属性设置为`true`，和<xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A>属性设置为传递的对象`errorInfo`参数。</xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A> </xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A>

trans-unit.source: The trace category that receives the message.
trans-unit.target: 接收的消息跟踪类别。

trans-unit.source: The trace message to write to the log.
trans-unit.target: 要写入日志的跟踪消息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that contains information about the error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>包含有关错误的信息。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Writes a trace message to the trace log.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪日志中写入跟踪消息。

trans-unit.source: Every time the <xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Write%2A> method is called, a <xref:System.Web.TraceContext> trace message is added to the <xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A> messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the <xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished> event.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Write%2A>调用方法时，<xref:System.Web.TraceContext>跟踪消息添加到<xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A>消息回收，这在处理时是可访问<xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished>事件。</xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished> </xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A> </xref:System.Web.TraceContext> </xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is added with its <xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A> property set to `false` and its <xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A> property set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 添加消息，使用其<xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A>属性设置为`false`及其<xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A>属性设置为`null`。</xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A> </xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A>

trans-unit.source: The trace message to write to the log.
trans-unit.target: 要写入日志的跟踪消息。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information to the trace log, including a message and any user-defined categories.
trans-unit.target: 将跟踪信息写入跟踪日志，包括消息和任何用户定义的类别。

trans-unit.source: Every time the <xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Write%2A> method is called, a <xref:System.Web.TraceContext> trace message is added to the <xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A> messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the <xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished> event.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Write%2A>调用方法时，<xref:System.Web.TraceContext>跟踪消息添加到<xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A>消息回收，这在处理时是可访问<xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished>事件。</xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished> </xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A> </xref:System.Web.TraceContext> </xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is added with its <xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A> property set to `false` and its <xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A> property set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 添加消息，使用其<xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A>属性设置为`false`及其<xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A>属性设置为`null`。</xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A> </xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A>

trans-unit.source: The trace category that receives the message.
trans-unit.target: 接收的消息跟踪类别。

trans-unit.source: The trace message to write to the log.
trans-unit.target: 要写入日志的跟踪消息。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information to the trace log, including any user-defined categories, trace messages, and error information.
trans-unit.target: 将跟踪信息写入跟踪日志，包括任何用户定义的类别、 跟踪消息和错误的信息。

trans-unit.source: Every time the <xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Write%2A> method is called, a <xref:System.Web.TraceContext> trace message is added to the <xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A> messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the <xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished> event.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Write%2A>调用方法时，<xref:System.Web.TraceContext>跟踪消息添加到<xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A>消息回收，这在处理时是可访问<xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished>事件。</xref:System.Web.TraceContext.TraceFinished> </xref:System.Web.TraceContextEventArgs.TraceRecords%2A> </xref:System.Web.TraceContext> </xref:System.Web.TraceContext.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is added with its <xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A> property set to `false`, and the <xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A> property is set to the object passed by the `errorInfo` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 添加消息，使用其<xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A>属性设置为`false`，和<xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A>属性设置为传递的对象`errorInfo`参数。</xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.ErrorInfo%2A> </xref:System.Web.TraceContextRecord.IsWarning%2A>

trans-unit.source: The trace category that receives the message.
trans-unit.target: 接收的消息跟踪类别。

trans-unit.source: The trace message to write to the log.
trans-unit.target: 要写入日志的跟踪消息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that contains information about the error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>包含有关错误的信息。</xref:System.Exception>
